title: Sweet milk pudding with vermicelli (payasam)
description: This is a very typical Tamil dessert; it will always be served at a Tamil wedding. A wedding that doesn’t serve payasam is not a real wedding, according to the locals. It’s slowly cooked milk reduced to the thickness of double cream and set with vermicelli and cardamom, decorated with pistachios, cashews and sultanas.
ingredients: ¼ tsp ground cardamom (or seeds from 8 pods)
